results.title: The effect of simvastatin treatment on bone repair of femoral fracture in animal model.
results.text_hl: The effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment on bone repair of @<m>DISEASE_Femoral_Fractures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005264 @@@femoral fracture@@@ in animal model.

citations.NLM: Issa JP, Ingraci de Lucia C, Dos Santos Kotake BG, Gonçalves Gonzaga M, Tocchini de Figueiredo FA, Mizusaki Iyomasa D, Macedo AP, Ervolino E. The effect of simvastatin treatment on bone repair of femoral fracture in animal model. Growth Factors. 2015 Apr;33(2):139-48. PMID: 25798995

results.title: Simvastatin reduces NF-kappaB activity in peripheral mononuclear and in plaque cells of rabbit atheroma more markedly than lipid lowering diet.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Twenty-four @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@ with induced @<m>DISEASE_Femoral_Fractures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005264 @@@femoral injury@@@ and on an @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherogenic@@@ diet were randomized to normolipidemic diet (n=9), or to continue the @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherogenic@@@ diet while receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 5 mg/kg/day (n=9) or no treatment (n=6) for 4 weeks.

citations.NLM: Hernández-Presa MA, Ortego M, Tuñón J, Martín-Ventura JL, Mas S, Blanco-Colio LM, Aparicio C, Ortega L, Gómez-Gerique J, Vivanco F, Egido J. Simvastatin reduces NF-kappaB activity in peripheral mononuclear and in plaque cells of rabbit atheroma more markedly than lipid lowering diet. Cardiovasc Res. 2003 Jan;57(1):168-77. PMID: 12504826
citations.BibTeX: @article{12504826, title={Simvastatin reduces NF-kappaB activity in peripheral mononuclear and in plaque cells of rabbit atheroma more markedly than lipid lowering diet.}, author={Hernández-Presa MA and Ortego M and Tuñón J and Martín-Ventura JL and Mas S and Blanco-Colio LM and Aparicio C and Ortega L and Gómez-Gerique J and Vivanco F and Egido J}, journal={Cardiovasc Res}, volume={57}, number={1}, pages={168-77}}
